name: Education & Academia
description: Shaping minds and advancing knowledge through teaching, research, and educational innovation.

subRoles.name: University Professor
subRoles.shortDescription: Teaches students and conducts research in a specialized field of study.
subRoles.longDescription: University professors educate students at the college or university level, typically in a specific subject area. They also conduct original research, publish scholarly articles, and contribute to their academic discipline.

dailyLife.hours: Flexible, but often beyond standard work hours

subRoles.potential: Respected profession with opportunities for intellectual growth. Tenure track offers job security for qualified candidates.

certifications: PhD or terminal degree in field

education.minimum: Master's degree for some positions, PhD preferred
education.preferred: PhD or terminal degree in relevant field

subRoles.name: Educational Technologist
subRoles.shortDescription: Designs and implements technology solutions for learning and education.
subRoles.longDescription: Educational technologists work at the intersection of education and technology. They develop e-learning platforms, create digital educational content, and implement learning management systems.

subRoles.name: Curriculum Developer
subRoles.shortDescription: Designs educational programs and learning materials.
subRoles.longDescription: Curriculum developers create educational content, design learning experiences, and develop assessment tools for schools, universities, and training organizations.
